title: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, mash the 3 ripe bananas (about 5 minutes).
Add 2 eggs and whisk together until well combined (2 minutes).
Stir in 1 cup of sugar, 1/4 cup of milk, and 1 tsp of cinnamon until mixed (2 minutes).
Gradually mix in 2 cups of flour and 1/2 tsp of sea salt until the batter forms (3 minutes).
Pour the mixture into a greased loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Beef Stir-Fry with Vegetables
instructions: Slice 1 lb of beef thinly (5 minutes).
Chop 2 cucumbers and 2 tomatoes into bite-sized pieces (5 minutes).
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add the beef to cook for about 7-10 minutes until browned.
Add the chopped cucumbers and tomatoes, season with spices and sea salt, and stir-fry for an additional 5-7 minutes until vegetables are tender.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
instructions: Bring a pot of salted water to boil and cook 8 oz of pasta according to package instructions (10-12 minutes).
While the pasta is cooking, pour 1 can of canned tomatoes into a saucepan over medium heat (2 minutes).
Season with spices and 1 tsp of sea salt and simmer for about 5-10 minutes.
Drain the pasta and mix with the sauce before serving.

title: Carrot and Yogurt Salad
instructions: Grate 4 large carrots (5 minutes).
In a bowl, mix the grated carrots with 1 cup of yogurt (2 minutes).
Season with spices and 1/2 tsp of sea salt, stirring until well combined (2 minutes).
Chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes before serving.

title: Chocolate Banana Cake
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a mixing bowl, mash 2 ripe bananas (3 minutes).
Add 2 eggs, 1 cup of milk, and 1/2 cup of chocolate syrup, mixing well (4 minutes).
Gradually add the cake mix and combine until smooth (3 minutes).
Pour the batter into a greased cake pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
